modName: Mana Shield - Magicka Shield with visual effect
summary: Have you ever felt that Wizards in Skyrim are too easy to be one-shotted ? Then you came to the right place !
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]DESCRIPTION:[/size]
[/color]
[/b][color=#ffff00][size=3][b]This is my second mod (Yes I'm a newbie ). So if you find any bugs, just tell me. I will keep it updating ![/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]+ Add a Mana Shield spell which can be toggled (ON/OFF) with visual effect. While having the Shield, you won't die.
[/size][color=#ffffff][size=3]
+ Thanks [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCflafNzO2axi0IdDfK9K3iw]Stormwolf[/url] for great Video:

[youtube]4Q3Ylt4DglQ[/youtube]
+ Thank Chaos_Hellfire for the video: ( My mod is 6:36 )

[youtube]Ke8JB9TOHC8[/youtube]

+ Thank[url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxApO7oRoOIUFgz62WNNsPg] Curry Gaming Inc[/url] for the video: ( My mod is 2:02 )[/size]

[youtube]wWgcclkrGFM[/youtube][/color]
[color=#00ff00]

[b][size=5]REQUIREMENTS:[/size][/b][/color]

[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/][size=5]SKSE[/size][/url]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#ff0000][size=6][b][center]
MUST READ:[/center][/b][/size][/color][/font][size=3]+ Beware the [b][color=#ffff00]﻿Concentration Spell[/color][/b], sometimes my spell go wrong when against this spell type. [color=#ffff00][b]=> Solution: Having Spell Absorb Chance >= 50% will completely solve this problem.[/b][/color]
[color=#ffff00]
[/color]+I don't recommend you to become a [color=#ffff00][b]Tanker[/b] [/color]with this spell. The more enemies attack at the sametime, the more wrong damage my spell calculating. [b][color=#ffff00]4 enemies at the sametime[/color][/b] maybe the best condition ![/size]

[size=3]+ If your Health is not 100%, you cast Mana Shield then your Health goes full. [/size][color=#ffff00][b][size=3]=> This is how my mod works. Turn off the spell and your Health will get back to before state.[/size]
[/b][/color]
[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]FEATURE:[/size][/color][/b]

[size=3]+ Spell Magic School: Restoration or Lesser Power.
+ The cost is 5 Magicka/s.
+ Mana Shield reducing all incoming damage by 33% then directs it to your Magicka instead of Health. ( [color=#ffff00][b]It stacks with your Armor/Resist [/b][/color])
+ While having Mana Shield, you can't be staggered and take no falling damage. (Trap damage is calculated as Physical, Poison, Element, Disease or Magic damage)
+ You will gain [b][color=#ff7700]Restoration EXP = ( TakenDamageToMagicka / 3 )[/color][/b][/size]

[color=#00ff00][size=5][b]FIXED BUGS:[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3][spoiler]
[color=#ffff00][b]+ Ver 1.8:[/b][/color]
_ Max Health changing leads to Wrong damage calculation.
_ Hearing many breaking sounds when the Shield get broken.
_ Dying instally when the shield is broken because of wrong damage calculation.

[b][color=#ffff00]+ Ver 1.5:[/color][/b]
- When you turn on the spell [b][color=#ffffff]right the moment you get hit[/color][/b], the damage taken may goes wrong: You lose all your current Magicka.[color=#ffff00][b][b]
[/b][/b][/color]_ [b][color=#ffffff]Sometimes[/color][/b] you won't lose Magicka when you get hit.

[color=#ffff00][b]+ Ver 1.1:[/b][/color]
_ When your Magicka < = 0, [b][color=#ffffff]sometimes[/color][/b] the Shield will be delayed to auto turn off.
_ If you have 50 Magicka left and the Enemy's attack is 200, it will breaks your ManaShield but you will take no damage into Health [b][color=#ffffff]only on that hit[/color][/b].[/size][b][color=#ffff00]
[/color][/b][size=3][/spoiler][/size]
[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]HOW TO GET THE SPELL:[/size][/color][/b]

[size=3]1. At Whiterun\Dragonsreach, look for Farengar, he sells [b][color=#ff0000]Spell Tome: Mana Shield[/color][/b] or [b][color=#ff00ff]Lesser Power: Mana Shield[/color][color=#ffffff]. ( If you don't see those spells from Farengar, please make sure the load order is at the bottom, go buy it then you can change the load order back. )[/color][/b]
2. If you are too lazy, open console then type:
    [color=#ff7700][b]help "mana shield" 4[/b][/color]
    Then look for [b][color=#ff7700]ID[/color][/b] of [color=#ff0000][b]Spell: Mana Shield[/b][/color] or [b][color=#ff00ff]Spell: Mana Shield Lesser Power[/color][/b][color=#efefef] then type:[/color]
    [b][color=#ff7700]player.addspell ID[/color][/b]
    Done, you got it.[/size]

[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]HOW DOES IT WORK:[/size][/color][/b]
[size=3][spoiler]
When the spell is casted I add to you:
+ 20000 Health to avoid one-shotted.
+ All Damage Resist by 33%.
+ Health Regen to 0% ( Because I calculating incoming damage by subtracting Health before and after a hit ). 
[/size][b][color=#ffff00][size=3]Don't worry, when Mana Shield is turn off, those stats would get back to normal[/size][/color][/b][size=3]. So if you use any mod or magic that involve to those stats, your gameplay maybe affected.
[/spoiler][/size]
[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]INSTALLTION:[/size][/color][/b]
[size=3][size=3]
Let NNM or your mod manager handle it.

[/size][/size][size=5][b][color=#00ff00]UNINSTALLTION:[/color][/b][/size]

[b][color=#ffff00][size=3]Turn off the spell before uninstalling.[/size][/color][/b]
[size=3]Delete via your NNM or mod manager, then use [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52363/]Save Cleaner[/url] because my mod has scripts.
[/size]
[color=#00ff00][size=5][b]COMPATIBILITY:
[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]A small spell mod maybe compatible with everything. But I recommend you look for the [/size][color=#00ff00][size=3][b]HOW DOES IT WORK[/b][/size][/color][size=3] to avoid game play problems.[/size]

[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]RECOMMEND MODS:[/size][/color][/b]

[size=3]+ [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87895/]Floating Damage[/url] to see exactly how much damage you taken.
[/size]

[color=#00ff00][size=5][b]USED MODS:[/b]
[/size][/color][spoiler]
[size=3]+ UI: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44091]A Matter of Time[/url], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79091]Widget Mod[/url], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51473]iNeed[/url] and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82725]Customizable UI Replacer[/url] ( I edited a little )
+ Clothes: [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SZa1CQ3EP7g&feature=youtu.be]Apex Senior Clothes HDT[/url]
+ Flying Book: There are 2 version of the book: Attack and Support. I just found Support Version: [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A9TUBB2NMBQ&feature=youtu.be]Grimoire Weiss[/url]
+ Flying Nabee: [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86625/][size=3]Dwemer Fairies[/size][/url]
[/spoiler]
[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]CREDIT:[/size][/color][/b]

[size=3]+ The visual effect comes from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37440/]Colorful Magic[/url] of [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6758294]184Gesu[/url] ( I have contacted him but look like he left Nexus for a long time. If he comeback and don't allow this one, I will take it off )[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19069]
[/url][/size][size=3]+ Thank to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28241/]Magicka Shield--Mana Shield Recreation[/url] of [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4819215]TripleSixes[/url] for the original idea of mana shield.

[size=5][font=Georgia][color=#ff7700][b]MY OTHER MODS:[/b][/color][/font]
[/size]
[size=3]+ [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88796][size=3]Levitate Toggle-able Spell - Flying with collision and free actions
[/size][/url][/size]
author: HydroBirous
